settings.title: Become an Affiliate
settings.content:
Share GoSun online with your own custom URL. Earn commissions from all sales generated from your link and purchases on our site. The GoSun Affiliate Program is managed Through Avantlink

Already an affiliate? Log in.

settings.title: Why Avantlink?
settings.answer:
From Avantlink's Website

Headquartered in Park City, Utah, AvantLink was founded in 2005 and is privately owned and supports approximately 35 employees. The company takes pride in being profitable and debt-free. It operates three independent affiliate networks in the US (Global Network), Canada, and Australia, all boasting leading advertisers and accomplished publishers.

settings.title: What's affiliate marketing?
settings.answer: Basically, you promote other peopleâ€™s products, often through an affiliate network, earning a commission if people actually end up buying thanks to your marketing.
